website_summaries.verdict: The overall feedback for the Sensebounce+ has been moderately positive. Some consumers feel as if this Adidas running shoe is perfect for their daily needs. Casual shoe enthusiasts have even lauded its capacity to take them through tasks that aren’t connected to athletics. The high-quality cushioning system and breathable upper have become the highlights of this product. On the other hand, the low-roofed forefoot and the slippery-on-wet-ground outsole have been criticized.Fans of neutral running shoes that are for the asphalt and other flat surfaces are the target market of the Adidas Sensebounce+.
pros: The cushioning system of the Adidas Sensebounce+ is hailed as a reliable partner for extended running sessions and speed training sessions
Consumers who have seen this road running shoe are happy with its overall visual design
The versatility of this product’s construction has been praised by those who like to use it for activities other than running
Some heavyset runners claim that the midsole is able to carry the weights of their bodies with ease
The breathability of the upper unit is appreciated by those who like a cover system that doesn’t feel stifling
In-shoe security has been thought of as precise and accommodating
testers don’t feel any wobbliness while wearing the Adidas Sensebounce+
cons: The roof of the forefoot section is deemed a bit low for some
the fabrics apparently had a tendency to rub against the foot uncomfortably
A tester has complained about the outsole not being too grippy on wet ground

customer_reviews.title: Below par quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son who likes them. The quality is terrible .... they started to fall apart within a few days. This was after a previous pair of adidas fell apart in 2 months with holes in each shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Trw3

customer_reviews.title: I don't care how you dress it up they are pink.
customer_reviews.text: When you look at this online they look like they could be slightly orange. They aren't the are very vividly pink. I don't really have an issue with that if I was looking for pink shoe. As far as comfort goes I love the way the Bounce, and Boost series shoes feel. Adidas have a tendency to run about half a size small.
customer_reviews.author: Darkwhyt81

customer_reviews.title: These shoes hurt my feet and rub blusters.
customer_reviews.text: Spend more money and get a Nike zoom fly, because these shoes are hard and have seams that will rub blusters around your ankle. They are nice looking but nice looking doesn't sell me as a true runner.
customer_reviews.author: Howard A. Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Defective shoe.
customer_reviews.text: The tounge of the shoe was sewn on backwards. It is not well made and looks rediculous!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Sainsbury

customer_reviews.title: Bounce soles are good for your soul
customer_reviews.text: Been leaning more to Adidas, the feel of their shoes while running or working out are superb. And the price is great as well. These shoes fit a snug, but exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Troy

customer_reviews.title: Feels great!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't broken in them runners, but I can tell it's going to be fun running long happy miles. Worthy!
customer_reviews.author: Ka-EL

customer_reviews.title: Veeeery comfortable
customer_reviews.text: One of the most comfortable shoes ive ever worn. I liked them soo much that i bought 3 pairs
customer_reviews.author: Chris Bentley

customer_reviews.title: Good price, great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I kinda expected it too feel slightly snug but i took out the insert and wore good socks and the feel great. I just got them so how well theyll hold up, its too early to tell but they are very well constructed , plus, the look very nice. Im very pleased I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: Jose

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I work on my feet all day and these shoes don't let me down. They've been going strong for a week so far with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Pain free!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. I have Morton’s neuroma and these shoes allow me to walk for exercise.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Yeager

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shoes for the gym, they’re lightweight and also the grip your feet. I do a lot of cardio and legs day lol so this definitely helps
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Factory seconds
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and durable. The lace area is tight due the way it is connected. The tongue label was sewn on backwards
customer_reviews.author: Buyer S

customer_reviews.title: Nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable sturdy shoe. Offers great support and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Felix Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for runners. Poor quality though
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for runners, but poor quality. Rotten after a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo

customer_reviews.title: Keep up the good work
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful shoe and I walk and go to the gym...👌👍
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: A++
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic running shoe in comfort, durability, and style. EXACTLY what I was looking for. I'll never buy a pair of Nikes again if I don't have to!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Gelo

customer_reviews.title: Sweet looking shoes and great cushioning!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cushioning and look, a little tight on the lacing part but nothing some breaking in won’t fix.
customer_reviews.author: Jorgie&Mari-Chu

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Wore them right out of the box and had no hot spots or blister from daily ware or running. Highly recommend if on sale!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nicee shoes!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! for the price, it looks like 120 dollars choes i am really recomended👍
customer_reviews.author: tomas perez

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable I’ve gotten a lot of complements on the style too
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Size does not fit as it should be
customer_reviews.text: Even if the size says its US13 it does not feel that way at all. Its really tight.
customer_reviews.author: Sumeet Gandhi

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Wore these in my first half marathon. Great fit, comfortable held up well.
customer_reviews.author: John Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a school teacher and is on his feet all day long. Although he can't wear these to school (crazy dress code), he wears these on the weekend and they make a HUGE difference! He's pain free for two days LOL! They are like wearing a sock, so I'm a little concerned that the fabric will fall apart. We'll see.... I'll update in three months.
customer_reviews.author: RdHdDgLvr

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent look and fit. Should have bought them months ago. Great price,too.
customer_reviews.author: glenda cash

customer_reviews.title: Label not backwards.... Duh.
customer_reviews.text: Great comfy shoe. Hard to find dead stock. Love the fit. And no.... The tongue is not on backwards you doofus. The label is supposed to look like that!! Maybe some Yeezy inspiration?
customer_reviews.author: A Hawk

product_meta.title: adidas Men's Sensebounce + Running Shoe
product_meta.description: Your go-to pair for long city runs. These men's shoes have a knit upper that provides a supportive, flexible fit. Energized cushioning delivers a springy ride, and deep grooves in the outsole offer reliable traction on uneven surfaces. The algae-based sockliner helps to clean liters of polluted lake water.
feature_bullets: Comfortable and supportive shoes for long city runs
This pair of shoes features an algae-based EVA foam that helps clean at least 30 liters of polluted lake water
